about_the_game:
"Cloud City" is a Chinese ancient city building strategy game with ancient-style city building, rich social simulation and economic system, and always dissatisfied subjects.

During the tumultuous times, with your martial arts and knowledge, you have come to a place suitable for rest and recovery. After establishing a camp, you have attracted several craftsmen from nearby villages to help you build here. You will lead the people to live and work in peace, reclaim wasteland, and build a stable city.

We have designed scenes with ancient style based on Chinese architecture and characters in the Ming and Qing dynasties. At the same time, the scene can change with the seasons and weather, allowing you to see the city's appearance at different times.

You can build a series of production processes to improve the efficiency of the entire society, or explore new map resources to produce more items and unlock more gameplay.

The game is currently actively being developed and iterated, and is currently in testing. The EA version is expected to meet with everyone in the fall of 2023.
